MineralSite.name: NI 43-101 Technical Report for the Haskins-Reed Project in North America dated August 2008.pdf

document.title: NI 43-101 Technical Report for the Haskins-Reed Project in North America dated August 2008.pdf
document.description: This technical report, prepared by Discovery Consultants for Pacific Bay Minerals Ltd., reviews the geological, geochemical, and geophysical data of the Haskins-Reed Property, detailing exploration history, mineralization types, and providing recommendations for future exploration.
